categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Tough 2 was a Delta-class JV-7 escort shuttle serving the Alliance Fleet. The ship was part of Tough group, which participated in the Skirmish at Outpost D-34. Tough 2, along with Tough 1 and 3 following Ravtin group, attempted to stop Imperial forces from capturing Onece 3 of Onece group, which carried their fellow Rebels. Both shuttle groups were unsuccessful and were all destroyed in the process.
The ship only appears in the Hard difficulty on Battle 1 mission 1.
